name: youtubeclonebackend
description: Backend implementation based on a tutorial https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/build-youtube-with-react/ 1. Install Postgresql to the local drive with an installer     2. Move to this project folder   3. Install Prisma to the folder https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/components/prisma-cli/installation   4. Form the tutorial, create "schema.prisma" on the project root. The tutorial says "prisma.schema" but it is not correct. 5. Install Prisma client via "npm install @prisma/client". It creates a database by reading the schema file.
